Korean: 잊은 것은 아니겠지. 자넨 이미 한 번 죽었네.\n그것도 걸레짝처럼 뭉개져서 말이지.
English: You haven't forgotten. You've already died once.\nIt's crushed like a mop.

Korean: 되살아난 육체는 움직이기는 하겠다만, 불안정하네.\n움직일 때마다 몸이 조금씩 무너질테지.
English: The revived body will move, but it's unstable.\nThe body will collapse a little with each move.

Korean: 완전히 붕괴하기 전에 살점을 보충하게나. \n 이를테면..
English: Let's replenish the flesh before it completely collapses..

Korean: 뭐야, 처음 보는 얼굴인데. \n 어디서 온 녀석이냐.
English: I've never seen him before. Where did he come from.
... Yeah... because I'm eating guys like that.
